title: Cambodia Moot Court Competition – ECCC
description: A national legal simulation competition focused on proceedings of the Extraordinary Chambers in the Courts of Cambodia (ECCC).

title: Willem C. Vis (East) International Commercial Arbitration Moot (School Round)
description: Arbitration and contract law-focused competition designed to prepare for the international Vis Moot.

title: Cambodian ILSA Chapter International Commercial Arbitration Mock Moot
description: Arbitration mock competition emphasizing claimant case strategy and written advocacy.

title: Provisional Detention Moot Hearing Competition
description: A legal advocacy contest focused on pre-trial detention rights and courtroom practice.

title: Youth Leadership Summit
description: National youth empowerment event recognizing innovative leadership practices.

title: Asia Development Foundation Scholarship
description: One of 30 selected students in Cambodia to receive university fee support.

title: 1st National Outstanding Award in Aspiration Competition
description: Successfully participated in the national aspiration competition and received an outstanding award.

title: Youth Labor Ambassador – Labor Plus
description: A youth-led outreach project to promote labor rights awareness among young people. Activities included organizing outreach, workshops, and social media campaigns to support labor education and rights advocacy.

title: Legal Youth Club
date: Not specified (likely ongoing as an extracurricular activity during 2023–2025)
description: A youth-led initiative focused on promoting legal awareness and civic engagement. The club actively shares legal knowledge through social media and podcasts, aiming to empower Cambodian youth on legal matters.

title: Clinic Legal Education of ELBBL Program – Criminal Law Mock Moot Competition
description: Won the Best Defendant Memorandum and Best Oralist as Defendant Lawyer in a mock criminal law moot competition.
